title: Person with White Cane
description: A person using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with a white cane emoji is depicted with a dignified posture and a smooth, gradient-filled form, emphasizing inclusivity and accessibility. The white cane itself is rendered with subtle highlights, suggesting its reflective surface and importance in navigation. This emoji on Apple‚Äôs platform conveys a sense of independence, awareness, and solidarity with individuals who are visually impaired, fostering a more understanding and supportive digital environment.
